name: Punjabi Students Association
campus: The Ohio State University – Columbus Ohio
purpose: We hope to bring together Indian and Pakistani Punjabis on campus and to bridge the gap that was created in Punjab by the partition. We hope to bring awareness to the Punjabi culture and collaborate with other organizations.

leaders.name: Waiz Kayani
leaders.blurb: Leads PSA with vision and community.

meeting.mapEmbedQuery: Ohio Union, 1739 N High St, Columbus, OH 43210

membership: Open; email or DM to join

announcement.message: Welcome! PSA at OSU is re-established — join us and follow on Instagram!
